name: Blurry Blush Pore Minimizing Cream Blush with Niacinamide
about: What it is: A blurring and pore-minimizing cream-to-powder blush that delivers a transfer-free, diffused, buildable pop of color to cheeks...Highlighted Ingredients: - Niacinamide: Boosts hydration, evens the look of skin tone, and reduces the appearance of pores..- Kaolin Clay: Creates blurred-out effect that's longwearing, transfer-free, and absorbs oil..- Copper Peptides: Conditions skin, helps calm redness, visibly improves texture, and protects skin barrier...Ingredient Callouts: This product is gluten-free, cruelty-free, and comes in recyclable packaging...What Else You Need to Know: This is a clean, lightweight liquid blush with a velvety texture that creates a soft-focus, vibrant color on cheeks. The long-wearing formula is packed with skin-boosting, hydrating, and oil-absorbing ingredients, great for minimizing pores for all-day wear...Clean & Planet Aware.Our ambitious curation of beauty made without controversial ingredients from brands dedicated to making meaningful environmental commitments, including sustainable ingredients and sourcing, packaging, corporate commitments, and consumer transparency.
ingredients: -Niacinamide: Boosts hydration, evens the look of skin tone, and reduces the appearance of pores..-Kaolin Clay: Creates blurred-out effect that's longwearing, transfer-free, and absorbs oil..-Copper Peptides: Conditions skin, helps calm redness, visibly improves texture, and protects skin barrier...Isododecane, Titanium Dioxide CI 77891, Synthetic Fluorphlogopite, Mica Cl 77019, Silica, Trimethylsiloxysilicate, Ethylene/Propylene/Styrene Copolymer, Disteardimonium Hectorite, Octyldodecanol, Iron Oxides CI 77491, Butylene/Ethylene/Styrene Copolymer, Silica Silylate, Caprylyl Glycol, 1,2-Hexanediol, Water/Aqua, Tocopheryl Acetate, Red 7 Lake CI 15850, Pentaerythrityl Tetra-di-t-butyl Hydroxyhydrocinnamate, Niacinamide, Kaolin, Glycerin, Copper Tripeptide-1, Albizia Julibrissin Bark Extract, Sodium Benzoate, Darutoside...The list of ingredients is subject to change. Please consult the packaging of the product purchased.
how_to_use: Suggested Usage:.-Using the boxing-glove-shaped applicator, apply one or two dots directly onto cheeks..-Blend out with a blush brush or tap gently into skin with your fingertips..-Buildable formula allows you to layer to increase pigment for a vibrant pop of color that lasts..-Mix Blurry Blush with So Blown Primer (sold separately) for a more diffused, natural shade...Recycling Instructions:.-Curbside recycle the FSC-certified post-consumer recycled paper carton..-Unscrew the 50 percent PCR vial and cap and clean out the remaining blush formula with warm water and dish soap..-Take the clean bottle and recycle at your local Sephora Pact Collective bin or mail to Pact Collective on caliraybeauty.com.

reviews.review_text: i was so excited to try this blush because i loved the baby pink color.. however itu2019s extremely hard to blend. brushes.. sponge.. fingers.. iu2019ve tried different methods like using my hand instead of directly applying to my face and this is impossible to use for me! when i do manage to blend it itu2019s extremely patchy.i recommend sadieu2019s liquid blush. itu2019s so easy to blend and gives a pretty glowy finish.

reviews.review_title: Blurs skin and lasts a long time
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I received this product in my Trendmood box. Iu2019m so glad I purchased this box because Iu2019ve been seeing makeup YouTubers online raving about this product. I completely agree with the rave reviews. First, the color is very lively and really brightens up my face. Second, when you blend out whether with fingers, brush, or sponge, it blurs seamlessly into the rest of your makeup and looks like lightening up from within. You can also easily layer the blush for more pigment. The blush is also highly pigmented so I know this product will last a while because a little goes a long way. I prefer this to the rare beauty liquid highlights because it feels better on the skin.

I received this very pigmented liquid blush in a trendmood box.  This was the first time I ever tried this brands blush.  The liquid is pigmented so use a little at first.  Itu2019s buildable so you can add more if needed. you need.  It blends easily but you must . It sets quickly
I received this blush in my Trendmood box and I do like it but it I'd very pigmented so a little goes a long way.

Thanks to Trendmood Box for the opportunity to try products at a great value.  Translated with DeepL.com (free version)

reviews.review_text: I had been eyeing this blush in the orchid pink color for a while now and finally pulled the trigger. The color is so pretty. Itu2019s the perfect cool pink that has almost a hint of lilac. Itu2019s definitely ultra pigmented, which I wasnu2019t expecting. The first time I applied it I went too heavy handed so now I just go in with the smallest amount. I love it though and itu2019s my new favorite blush.

reviews.review_title: Pigmented & airbrush effect but learning curve
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: A little goes a long way. The first few times I used this, I looked like a clown. However, after some trial and error, I see the appeal and like it. Iu2019ve been using it a lot, the pigment is great and it has an airbrush effect on the skin. You need to blend immediately upon applying and start with very little product. I just removed a star because itu2019s not super easy to use and takes time getting used to. But I think itu2019s worth it.

reviews.review_text: This blush is the bomb. Usually blush disappears completely from my face after an hour, but this actually stays, and the color is so pretty too! So happy with it I bought another color sublime for when I want a darker look. I like the cool tones available. Also feels like nothing on my face, and the texture looks natural, not greasy. Be wary though if you let a swatch dry it will set that way. But oil cleanser will remove it. Amazing blush, just try it now!

reviews.review_text: I love love love this formula. Stays on all day. The only complaint is the component it comes in. Gets pretty messy because it doesnu2019t have the suction mechanism that keeps a lot from coming out.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Beautiful bright pigmented blush!  So nice! Am impressed with these blushes.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Iu2019m in LOVE with this formula but PLEASE expand the shade range! Cool toned blushes donu2019t work well on me so Zen is the only one I can use. It still pulls a little cool on me so I pair it with Virtue from rare beauty. I am more of a satin/matte foundation girlie, so I prefer blushes that matchu2014with pigment thatu2019s still blendable and natural. This is it!  Itu2019s so hard to find a good one these days that isnu2019t glowy or that gives more of a flushed look. I already use this multiple times a week but I would use this daily if there were warmer options.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Excellent blush, pigmented - you only need one dot per cheek. Lasts all day on my normal/dry skin. It actually blurs more than any blush I can ever recall. Blends with no effort. Gorgeous formula

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Okay, this is IT. Blush is the most important part of my makeup routine and I'm very particular about formula and color. I had been trying out as many blushes in sephora that I could before I stumbled on this one. It didn't look very promising, but I did a double take when I tried it.  The pinks are what pink blushes need to be: flushed and dolly. They need to be seen to be appreciated! I thought it was too bold on first swatch, but it looks perfect on the cheeks. You can use it lightly and get a more natural finish, but the pinks are so balanced that it'd be difficult to look overdone even if you use a lot (and trust me, I'm not light-handed). Besides that, it dries down matte, but it's a blurry almost cloudy matte that actually makes it look poreless. I tend to stay away from powder blushes because they either go on chalky, look like a weird film on my skin, or have awful color payoff. And I don't like glossy, dewy highlighter blushes because it makes your cheeks appear oily and bloated, sticks to your hair, and is pointless because the finish disappears because you HAVE to set it or else it'll be gone in 10 minutes. I digress. This is a liquid to powder formula, a very forgiving and easy combo to work with.  And yes, it's long-lasting. On a normal day (say, 8hrs), it will last through almost anything you need. I sleep in it on some busy days, and in the morning, a good amount is still left over after 24hrs. This is coming from someone who only looks for long-lasting blushes and somehow they always last 5 hours max...   Extra info: I don't use foundation and I have some slight texture on my cheeks. The pigmentation is so strong on its own that I don't need a blank slate for it to pop. I live in a dry, hot climate but I have combo skin, so products do tend to disappear on me. The color I got was Dope, and I used my own dollar bills...  So yeah, no false advertising here.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Iu2019ve gotten a chance to use this twice so far and absolutely love how this blended in to my base after foundation. It also didnu2019t take much to add a ton of color. Iu2019m thoroughly impressed and am excited to continue using this blush!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Iu2019ve been looking for a new blush for fall and the shade dope is the perfect mauve pink. The blush is quite pigmented but looks smooth and blurring. It really compliments my medium to tan complexion especially for the fall weather. Itu2019s creamy and blends beautifully too.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I am using this blush so much!! I chose the shade u201cEpic,u201d a cool-toned, bubblegum baby pink. Because the pigment has a white base, it gives a really intense pop of color on application, and as you blend it out (I use my fingers or sometimes a sponge) it becomes really diffused and has such a weightless, cloud-like finish. I love how much color payoff I can get even with one little dot on each cheekbone blended allll the way out! Iu2019m constantly doing my makeup for performances onstage, and this is my new go-to blush for the past several weeks.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have the shade u201cDream Stateu201d and itu2019s a beautiful bright pink color. This blush is very hydrating and has a natural finish to it. It feels very lightweight on and can be layered nicely without looking patchy. I did notice its blurring as well (my pores looked minimized!!). I really like how this shade gives a pop of color to my cheeks!! Itu2019s so pretty!

reviews.review_title: Just Ok Without Powder on Top
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, red hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Not sure how I feel about this blush, it might live up to its claims but not sure it lives up to my expectations. I have Sublime, it should be a muted berry, and it ended up more of a muted deep rose on me than having much purple/red-violet tones of a berry.  It applied well, 2 dots covered what I expected from using cream blushes before. Maybe it is because it is a blurring blush, but I don't really care for how it sat on my skin. Without a powder blush on top it didn't seem to marry with my skin well and was more sitting on top.  It had a nice staying power and my sensitive skin didn't react at all, which is nice. I feel there is some room for improvement, either the formula or with my application/how they say we apply it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I got shade dream state and find it to be such a pretty and flattering shade of true pink. A little goes a long way and I really only need one dot blended out on each cheek. Finish is satin and it doesnu2019t enlarge texture

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love how pretty this pink color is and how itu2019s such a popping blush color. I love how easy it Is to blend and how well it layers with my makeup. Itu2019s a great balance between the perfect pop of color without being too heavy!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This blush is so beautiful I love the color and when it blends it distributes so evenly and smooth and does blur. It gives my checks and face such a nice natural soft look. The shade is also nice and pigmented

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I got the shade Zen which is a nude pink! I have very pale skin and it still looks natural when I put it on. It definitely minimizes pores and gives a blurring effect. The only issue is that the color stains your skin and you canu2019t take it off easily.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I love this blush. Itu2019s such a beautiful color & the pigment is pretty nice. You can build it up but personally I like a little bit for more of a natural look. Iu2019m glad Iu2019m able to fulfill that with this blush!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received the shade Epic and I want to start off with if you donu2019t like very pink blushes, then this will not be for you, but if you like pink (and I am talking Barbie pink) this is very pretty. These are a liquid, but dry down (very quickly) and so you arenu2019t left with any tackiness. Since this do dry quickly I recommend going in with one cheek at a try and blend quickly because once they dry down they arenu2019t moving. I canu2019t say this is going to become an all time favorite blush, but they are nice. I donu2019t really notice any blurring though.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I was so excited to see a blush advertised as having skincare benefits! I think I might have chosen the wrong color for my skin tone, since Iu2019m super pale and the blush was a hot pink. It dries really fast, So Iu2019d be mindful of being quick at blending!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: i was quite curious hearing about this blurring blush. not only does it work as a cute blush makeup but it also blurs and covers pores, how grand is that. personally really love the blurring effect, it erases away the greasy feeling and look

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: wow i am absolutely loving this amazing new blush from calliray! it was so hard to choose a color because they all looked gorgeous. the product is so easy to use and blends in smoothly. i recommend this!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I am normally not the biggest fan of liquid blush, but this one is a GAME CHANGER! It is very pigmented, so a little goes a long way and the finish is so velvety and airbrushed looking on the skin! Itu2019s also super long lasting. It looks as good at the end of the day as when you first apply it! Zen is the perfect peachy pink and Iu2019m obsessed!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Finally a blush with skin loving ingredients! The shade Epic is a stunning, cool pink that gives your cheeks a fresh, healthy glow. Its creamy, smooth texture makes blending a breeze. Plus, itu2019s packed with niacinamide, known for minimizing pores and soothing your skin. I've definitely noticed my pores look blurred when I wear this blush! It's highly pigmented, so a little goes a long wayu2014just one dot on each cheek is perfect for me. This blush also feels wonderfully hydrating, making it a treat for your skin while adding that perfect pop of color.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this blush! Itu2019s super pigmented, but it blends on the skin just like butter. It doesnu2019t feel heavy at all and it has a really nice coverage because of its creamy texture. Definitely recommend it

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Caliray Blurry Blush in the shade Epic Short is a delightful addition to any makeup lover's collection. The formulation feels lightweight and buildable, allowing for a seamless blend that gives off a natural flush. The shade itself strikes a lovely balance between soft and vibrant, making it versatile for various skin tones. One of the standout features is the unique blurring effect it offers, which gives the skin a smooth, diffused look, perfect for everyday wear or special occasions. The blush is also long-lasting, maintaining its integrity throughout the day without fading. The packaging is sleek and travel-friendly, making it easy to slip into a makeup bag. Overall, Caliray's Blurry Blush in Epic Short is a winner for anyone seeking a natural, flattering flush with a touch of sophistication. Highly recommended!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This blush is a total enigma. It not only gives you the prettiest pink shade to your cheeks ever, itu2019s also blurs the look of pores to create a smooth effect to your skin. I am absolutely obsessed with how much Iu2019m loving it right now!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I was so excited to try this product! Color pay off was very beautiful on the skin.  The applicator and packaging is very nice and easy to use.  I will note that after a long day of wear it seems that the color changed slightly to a more orange undertone!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: My shade felt very crayonish. Itu2019s not exactly glossy if thatu2019s what you are expecting. Itu2019s more matte and sticky. Even leaves a residue behind when it wears off. I liked mixing it up with other shades to get the consistency and shades I like.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This blush was immediately love for me! It truly gives a matte, blurred effect, and looks amazing on the skin. It blends out really easily, and is a very forgiving formula (you donu2019t have to worry that youu2019re going overboard, as you do with some other liquid blush formulas). The shade Epic is a cool pink and so so pretty for my light cool skin. I want all of these now!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This liquid blush is incredibly easy to blend out . Leaves a very air brushed, diffused look on the skin . Zen is a nude pinkish shade, leaning more warm than cool. I have normal/dry skin and had no issues with wear time .

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I love this liquid blush! I love the packaging and the large applicator. The blush itself is nice and pigmented but blends out like a dream. Works great with a brush and beauty blender. I recommend for anyone looking for a new liquid blush!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Omg!! I loved loved this blush, is so creamy but as the description said is super blurry and it last me the whole day, I read the other reviews and is all true!! Is a must buy and is the perfect bubble gum pink color!! Obsessed ud83eudd70ud83dude0d

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Honestly surprised by all the awesome reviews, but most are incentivized.  These didnu2019t even last through a workout and I donu2019t sweat much!  Iu2019m a blush fanatic and have fairly easy skin, and I didnu2019t like these.  I got the cool pink AND berry and found them way TOO pigmented (never thought Iu2019d say that) and also blotchy.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I got the shade dope and it was as described. Itu2019s a cute rose mauve color and it is such a cute pop of color! It blends out really beautifully it is lightweight and has a nice blurring effect. You can really build up the color as well!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Caliray is such an overlooked brand! This blush is so nice - sits really nicely on my skin on top of foundation or just spf. Will definitely be adding this into my regular makeup rotation from now on!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This blush packs a serious punch when it comes to pigment! A little dot or two is all you need for all day wear! These are so blurring and look airbrushed. They do try quick so have to work quickly with them.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This blush is so worth the money! Itu2019s very pigmented, so a little goes a long way. The cool-toned pink is perfect!! I love how it blends out very velvety on the skin and has a blurring effect, making my skin appear smoother. I use it over my foundation and concealer, and they melt together effortlessly.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This blush is actually amazing! Whenever I see a product that claims it gives a blur, Iu2019m instantly intrigued and this one definitely lives up to the claim! I donu2019t even understand how but it makes the skin look velvety almost powdered down to blur and minimize the look of pores. And it was super lightweight on the skin! My only thing is that the shades are all more ashy and cool toned. I chose the shade zen which seems to be the most warm but it was still quite light and pasty on my medium warm skin tone. Please come out with more shades! The formula is amazing

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Blurry Blush Pore Minimizing Cream Blush is such a nice liquid blush. You only need a little to obtain excellent pigmentation, it blends very easily and work very well with the foundation. It lasts long and leaves the face with a luminous appearance.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I love how perfectly pigmented this is!! Blends out great and the color ranges are gorgeous. I like how big the applicator is for more product but a little Goes a long way. Definitely a great summer and spring blush!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: One of the best blushes Iu2019ve tried in awhile! The pigment is deep and long lasting and this actually does blur & perfect my skin. Sits beautifully on the skin and plays nicely with the rest of my makeup and the shade is the best peach!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Hello Pink Pigment!! This blush is very pigmented so I only needed three small dots for the level of bold I wanted. I love the doe foot applicator. It was easy to blend out you still need to be a little fast before it dries down. I think it blurred it a little but I have big pores.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: A little goes a long way with this blush! I only needed one dot of the formula for each cheek. The color Dream state is the perfect pink to bring that flushed look back to my face! Itu2019s easy to blend out and very lightweight on my skin. My favorite thing about this formula is the way it blurs out my pores.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Ive used this Blurry Blush for the past few days and itu2019s so beautiful! It has such a lovely formula; I love how pigmented it is and how easy it blends on the skin, it gives a beautiful soft focus effect to the skin and I love that it doesnu2019t emphasize texture or pores; the shade I got it super flattering and it now thinking on picking up a couple more shades

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is such a nice liquid blush! The formula builds nicely and has a lightweight feel on the skin. It does have a more matte finish that has good staying power, especially when applied directly to the skin.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This is a beautiful liquid blush. I have the other caliray liquid blush and these are so different. This one is more opaque, more blurring. Super easy to blend out. Beautiful wearable shades. I love the soft neutral pink i got!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this Blurry Blush Pore Minimizing Cream Blush by Caliray. This is a very unique product! I love that itu2019s made with the simplest of ingredients. It comes in so many beautiful shades. I tried the sublime shade. It looks beautiful with my complexion and feels very lightweight. I have large pores on my nose and cheeks and It minimizes and blurs my pores so they are not noticeable at all. It has a blurring effect that I love and appreciate in cosmetics. I applied in the morning and it was still beautiful eight hours later.  It has just the right amount of color and looks very natural and has a velvety soft finish. I love the applicator and itu2019s  very easy to use! Itu2019s hydrating, long lasting and has beautiful color options!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: As a huge fan of Caliray, I knew this blush would give what it needs to! The blush shades are beautiful and as someone who suffers from dry skin, this melts into the skin and doesnu2019t emphasize any lines or texture so far.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This blush is super pigmented. I only use one dot for both cheeks and I have to actually wipe off a lot from the applicator else it looks like clown cheeks. The color Sublime is a bold berry pink. This sets fast so you have to be quick to blend. I see why they named it blurry blush. It gives a very diffused look without any effort. This feels great on my dry skin and doesn't budge even if I don't set it! Seeing how little (and I mean little) I need this will last me forever

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: If you love the sunburnt trend youu2019re going to love the color dope. Itu2019s such a beautiful color that gives amazing coverage and pigment. It didnu2019t make my texture worse , which I really appreciate it. Application was smooth and had great pigment.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I just tried the Caliray Cream Blush in the color Sublime, and it's fantastic! The blush blends seamlessly into the skin and gives a beautiful, natural flush. The color is perfect for adding a touch of warmth to my complexion. Plus, it's a clean beauty product, which makes me love it even more. Highly recommend!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Love this beautiful blush. I got the shade Epic, a very pretty cool pink. It blurs and stays all day long. It blends easily and you don't need a lot to get a beautiful flush of color on the cheek. I can't wait to get more shades !

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, red hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I donu2019t know the magic that is in this blush but you need it! I have the shade sublime which is absolutely gorgeous. The formula is thin and easy to blend, yet can be built up without looking clown like, plus, the pore minimizing effect really does work!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Ive used this Blurry Blush for the past few days and itu2019s so beautiful! It has such a lovely formula; I love how pigmented it is and how easy it blends on the skin, it gives a beautiful soft focus effect to the skin and I love that it doesnu2019t emphasize texture or pores; the shade I got it super flattering and it now thinking on picking up a couple more shades

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This blush is super bright so be sure to start with a TINY dot of product. It has pigment power and you can really see a difference upon application. It's easy to blend and manipulate before it sets on your face. My bright pink color looked super natural.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Such a beautiful shade I got the shade sublime, it fits really well on a medium olive skin tone. I love how well it blends, smooths out my skin and blends well with the rest of my makeup. It is lightweight but buildable. Gorgeous color and formula.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This blush is SO pretty on my skin. Itu2019s definitely got that blurred look to it that it claims to have and itu2019s SUPER pigmented. Like only put on a teeny dot and blend it in. Love that cuz it means itu2019ll last so long!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, red hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is such a gorgeous blush! I got it in the shade dream stage and itu2019s just the most beautiful bubble gum pink. The texture of it is amazing. It has really good pigmentation, a little goes a long way. And it blurs the skin underneath. It feels incredibly light on my skin and blends in easily. I would totally recommend. This is one of my new favorite liquid blushes.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Calirayu2019s new blush is a standout addition to any makeup collection. It boasts a lightweight, buildable formula that effortlessly blends into the skin for a natural, radiant finish. The shade range is impressive, catering to a variety of skin tones with options that provide both subtle and vibrant looks. Its long-lasting wear ensures that you stay fresh-faced throughout the day.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brunette hair, Medium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I think the product is really great, very nice formula. Blends out beautifully and has great staying power. I gave 4 stars because of the color range. I purchased Dope, was it pulls a little cool on my skin tone. Would love to see this line with more warm tones.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Gray eyes, black hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Blurry Blush Pore Minimizing Cream with Niacinamide combines a pore-blurring effect with the skincare benefits of niacinamide. This multitasking cream not only minimizes the appearance of pores and controls shine but also brightens the skin and evens out the skin tone over time. Its lightweight, non-greasy formula absorbs quickly, leaving a soft, matte finish thatu2019s perfect as a makeup base. With added niacinamide, it helps to reduce redness and strengthen the skin barrier, making it suitable for all skin types, especially those with combination or oily skin.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Medium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I was gifted the blurry blush in exchange for my thoughts. I love how creamy the formula is and itu2019s very pigmented. It blends really nicely which I love. And has a nice color! I would definitely recommend and try in other color

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Calirayu2019s Blurry Blush Pore Minimizing Cream Blush in the shade Epic combines beauty and skincare effortlessly. Infused with niacinamide, it helps minimize pores while delivering a soft, buildable flush of color. The creamy texture blends seamlessly, giving you a natural, radiant glow with skin-loving benefits. Perfect for all-day wear!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love the natural light pink color, I got zen and itu2019s so beautiful and soft! Itu2019s very light weight and blend able. You donu2019t need a lot, just a small dot on each cheek! The finish was very matte and velvety

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This blurry blush is so good. It really did look blurred on the cheeks. It is a very pigmented blush. I started off with one for just in case and it was pigmented and it was plenty for my cheek. It did not separate on my cheeks which I love. It lasted pretty much & hours and I do want to get more colors.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this blush so much! I got the shade Dream State which gives me a bright pink flushed look. I have an olive undertone complexion which I was scared to pair with such a bright pink but it came out looking so nice. It also blurred my pores and made my skin look velvety when it blended in.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love how versatile this product is. I love the subtle look and the colour is very pretty. The selectioof product colours are anazing. Gives a sheer look but can be built accordingly. Would love to try more

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This is an awesome blush! I love how easy it is to apply to my skin. A little goes a long way with this one and gives such a beautiful colorful glow to my skin. I love that is feels nourishing and soft. Doesn't feel dry or cakey.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Super pigmented and will last forever! I literally only put a small dot on my cheeks and it was borderline too much, less is more with this product! I absolutely love the sublime shade; it's perfect for my cool toned skin.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The Caliray Blurry Blush Pore Minimizing Cream Blush with Niacinamide is lightweight, blends effortlessly, and provides a matte finish. Niacinamide helps to blur pores and even skin tone, making it perfect for achieving that smooth, airbrushed effect. The Dope shade is a beautiful, subtle pop of color that enhances any complexion. Ideal for those with oily skin and want skincare benefits with their makeup!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This blush is so good!! The formula is smooth, very lightweight and super pigmented. A little bit goes a long way. I got the shade Zen which is a pretty peachy pink color. I love the velvety finish of the blush. Iu2019m very impressed by this formula.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The Caliray Blurry Blush in Epic is the cutest bubble gum pink shade ever! It gives my cheeks a beautiful pop of color with a soft, diffused finish. The formula is lightweight and hydrating, and it visibly blurs pores for a flawless look. Perfect for a fresh, natural glow!

Love this blush! A little goes a long way, the pigment is great! I got the shade Dope which is a rosy mauve. It is lightweight and I love that is blurs your pores and gives a pop of color. It is a velvety texture that goes on smoothly.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This is definitely my new go to blush. The color is absolutely beautiful and the pigment is extremely strong with one little dot you will be good to go. But I like to do is put it on after my contour.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I recently received this cream blush in the shade Sublime and without a doubt, this is the MOST pigmented cream blush Iu2019ve ever tried!! The formula is super smooth and feels absolutely weightless. I wore it all day and the color lasted the entire day! The finish was more matte and satiny and I just really love the pop of color it gives my face. Hands down my favorite cream blush, definitely give it a try if youu2019re in the market for new blush!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This blush is so pigmented and a little goes a long way! Definitely buildable if you like a more blush heavy look. I got shade dope and think its perfect for everyday wear. Blended like a dream and definitely had a blurring effect on my skin! Felt lightweight on the skin and has great longevity too. Compact and good for travel as well!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I recently tried the Caliray Blurring Cream Blush for the first time, and I'm impressed! The formula is super creamy and blends effortlessly into the skin, giving a natural, blurred finish. The color is buildable, so you can keep it subtle or go bold. I love how it instantly adds a healthy flush without looking cakey. Perfect for first-time users, itu2019s a great option if you want a fresh, radiant glow that lasts all day!
